need-connect-permission: Mir fehlt die `connect` Berechtigung in diesen Sprach-Kanal!
need-speak-permission: Mir fehlt die `speak` Berechtigung in diesen Sprach-Kanal!
need-embed-permission-for-goodbye: Mir fehlt die `embed links` Berechtigung, um eine Abschiedsnachricht in diesen Kanal senden zu können.
need-embed-permission-for-welcome: Mir fehlt die `embed links` Berechtigung, um eine Wilkommensnachricht in diesen Kanal senden zu können.
need-nsfw-channel-to-be-used: Du musst im NSFW Kanal um diesen Befehl nutzen zu können!
cant-send-pm: Ich kann dir keine Privatnachrichten senden, versuche mir diesen Befehl im Privaten-Chat zu senden.
have-to-be-lover: Du musst ein Liebhaber auf meinen Server sein, um das machen zu können!
command-invalid-usage: Unbekannter Befehl. Benutze `{}` um dir Befehle anzeigen zu lassen.
put-the-role-id-instead: Ungültiger Aufbau des Befehls. Du musst die ID der Rolle einsetzen.
music-over-used: Entschuldigung, aber ich bin momentan überlastet. Um eine globale Mindestleistung aufrechtzuerhalten, kann ich zurzeit kein Lied abspielen.
music-load-failed: Entschuldigung, aber dieses Video ist nicht mehr verfügbar. Benutze {}, um die erweiterte Suche zu aktivieren.
music-no-result: Sorry, there is no result for your search. Try to use {} to perform an advanced search.
music-estimated-time: Geschätzte Zeit, bevor das Lied abgespielt wird: {}
music-not-in-dm: Entschuldigung, aber du kannst Musik Befehle nicht in Privatnachrichten benutzen!
music-not-my-channel: Du musst im {} sein, um diesen Befehl nutzen zu können.
music-volume-higher-than-100: Du musst ein Patron sein, um das Volumen über 100 setzen zu können.
music-when-adding-pl: Du kannst kein Lied hinzufügen, wenn eine Playlist schon hinzugefügt ist...
not-connected: Ich bin zurzeit nicht mit einen Sprach-Kanal verbunden!
not-the-right-channel: Du musst in meinen Sprach-Kanal sein, um diesen Befehl ausführen zu können.
bot-disabled-command: Du kannst diesen Befehl nicht auf diesen Server ausführen, da er deaktiviert ist.
bot-bind-mod: You cannot use commands on this channel, I'm bound to another channel.
bot-cooldown: Du bist etwas zu hastig. Versuche es in einen Moment erneut.
bot-not-mp: Dieser Befehl kann nicht in Privatnachrichten benutzt werden.
bot-not-enough-permissions: Du kannst diesen Befehl nicht benutzen, da dir die benötigten Berechtigungen fehlen.
cmd-clean-help:
Löscht meine Nachrichten von diesen Kanal.
Wenn du nicht angibst, wie viele Nachrichten gelöscht werden sollen, werden 100 meiner Nachrichten gelöscht.
cmd-purge-help:
Löscht bis zu (num_msg) Nachrichten in diesen Kanal.
Wenn du nicht angibst, wie viele Nachrichten gelöscht werden sollen, werden 100 Nachrichten gelöscht.
cmd-stfu-help:
Löscht bis zu (num_msg) Nachrichten von einen Benutzer in diesen Kanal.
Wenn du nicht angibst, wie viele Nachrichten gelöscht werden sollen, werden 100 Nachrichten gelöscht.
cmd-prefix-change-help: Allows to change the current server prefix.
cmd-prefix-reset-help: Resets the server prefix to the global one.
cmd-ignore-help: Disables my commands in the current channel.
cmd-disabledcommand-help: Manages the disabled commands of the server.
cmd-disabledcommand-add-help: Disables a command on the server.
cmd-language-help:
Sets my language.
Available languages can be displayed with language list.
cmd-blacklist-add-help:
Adds a user to the guild blacklist.
Blacklisted users on the guild cannot use my commands.
cmd-blacklist-remove-help: Removes a user or a role from the guild blacklist.
cmd-hackban-help: Bannt ein Mitglied vom Server mit seiner Benutzer-ID.
cmd-welcome-welcome_off-help: Deaktiviert die Willkommensnachricht auf diesen Kanal.
cmd-goodbye-goodbye_off-help: Deaktiviert die Abschiedsnachricht auf diesen Kanal.
cmd-autorole-help: Sets an autorole (or several) for new members of the server.
cmd-joinclan-help: Allows to get a role. You cannot have multiple clans at the same time.
cmd-clan-add-help: Allows to add a clan to the server, members can join it with joinclan
cmd-clan-delete-help: Allows to delete a clan of the server.
cmd-clan-list-help: Displays the available clans of the server.
cmd-ily-help: Wenn du wissen möchtest, ob ich dich liebe.
cmd-roll-help:
Generates a random number between 0 and the max specifed.
Can also generate a random number between two numbers.
Otherwise generate a random number between 0 and 100.
cmd-flip-help: Wirft eine Münze, wenn kein Benutzer angegeben ist. Anderfalls wird der Benutzer geworfen.
cmd-dog-help: Zeigt ein zufälliges Bild von einem Hund.
cmd-cat-help: Zeigt ein zufälliges Bild von einer Katze.
cmd-customcommand-help:
Manages the custom commands of the server.
You can also create your own command, for more informations use help cc add.

- Image links in custom commands are automatically hidden.
cmd-customcommand-add-help:
Allows to add a custom command on the server.
By putting >>> at the beginning, the custom command will run the selected command.
By putting && between commands, every commands are launched together.
cmd-customcommand-raw-help: Displays the real content of a custom command.
cmd-customcommand-edit-help: Allows to edit a custom command that already exist on the server.
cmd-customcommand-delete-help: Allows to delete a custom command on the server.
cmd-ascii-help: Gibt einen Text in Ascii wieder.
cmd-poll-help: Erstellt eine Umfrage, mit den folgenden Fragen.
cmd-meme-help:
Generiert einen Meme.
Dein Text wird an den Benutzer-Avatar oder auf ein Bestimmtes Bild platziert.
cmd-osu-help:
Zeigt Informationen über Osu an! Profil
Du kannst einen Modus auswählen. Der Standartmodus wird genutzt, falls du keinen Modus angibst.
Verfügbare Modi: Standard, Taiko, Ctb, Mania
cmd-choice-help:
Wählt eine, unter mehereren Optionen, zufällige aus.
Setze >>> am Anfang ein, um den ausgewählten Befehl zu starten

- Links zu Bildern sind in diesen Befehl automatisch versteckt.
cmd-anime-help: Zeigt Informationen über einen Anime an.
cmd-manga-help: Zeigt Informationen über einen Manga an.
cmd-char-help: Zeigt Informationen über einen Anime oder Manga Charakter an.
cmd-nextep-help: Gibt die verbleibende Zeit vor der nächsten Animefolge an.
cmd-weeb-help: Zeigt meine Anime-Befehlsliste an (ermöglicht durch weeb.sh und triggered-api.tk).
cmd-help-help: Gibt meine Befehlsliste oder hilfe für einzelne Befehle aus .
cmd-shard-help: Shows on which shard you currently are.
cmd-me-help: Erlaubt dir, über mich zu sprechen.
cmd-avatar-help:
Zeigt den Avatar eines Benutzers an.
Falls du keinen Benutzer angibst, wird dein Avatar angezeigt.
cmd-userinfo-help:
Zeigt Informationen über einen Benutzer an.
Falls du keinen Benutzer angibst, werden Informationen über dich angezeigt.
cmd-serverinfo-help: Zeigt Informationen über den Server an.
cmd-roleinfo-help: Zeigt Informationen über eine Rolle an. Groß-und Kleinschreibung wird beachtet!.
cmd-credits-help: Zeigt die Leute an, welche einen speziales Dankeschön verdienen.
cmd-changelog-help:
Displays my last patch notes.
For further informations about old patch notes, visit my official server.
cmd-don-help: Displays informations and links to support me.
cmd-id-help:
Zeigt die Benutzer-ID an.
Falls du keinen Benutzer angibst, wird Deine ID ausgegeben.
cmd-suggestion-help: Sends a suggestion to the developer.
cmd-feedback-help: Sends a feedback about me to the developer.
cmd-giverole-help: Gives a role to an user on the guild.
cmd-setrole-help: Configures which roles can be obtained with the getrole command.
cmd-setrole-add-help: Makes a role obtainable with the getrole command.
cmd-setrole-remove-help: Un-makes a role obtainable with the getrole command.
cmd-setrole-reset-help: Resets the list of the obtainable roles.
cmd-setrole-list-help: Displays every roles which can be obtained with the getrole command.
cmd-getrole-help: Allows to get a role or to remove it. Warning, this is case sensitive.
cmd-join-help: Summons me into your voice channel or into the specified one.
cmd-play-help:
Enqueues a song with an url or keywords.
Can also enqueue a stream or a radio.
cmd-bind-help: Avoid the use of the commands in every channel except in the one where the command is used.
cmd-stop-help: Stops the player and clears the queue.
cmd-resume-help: Resumes a song if it is currently paused.
cmd-forceskip-help:
Skips the current song without needing to vote.
If you specify a queue position, skips every song until the chosen position.
cmd-np-help: Returns some informations about the current song.
cmd-active-help: Displays all my players with their states.
cmd-volume-help:
Sets the playback volume. Accepted values are from 0 to 150.
Putting + or - before the volume will make the volume change relative to the current volume.
If you don't specify any new volume, returns the current volume.
cmd-pl-start-help:
Starts an autoplaylist.
If you don't specify any autoplaylist, it loads yours.
cmd-plstart-help:
Starts an autoplaylist.
If you don't specify any autoplaylist, it loads yours.
cmd-pl-new-help: Creates a new autoplaylist that can be loaded.
cmd-plnew-help: Creates a new autoplaylist that can be loaded.
cmd-pl-info-help: Gives informations about an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, about the current autoplaylist.
cmd-plinfo-help: Gives informations about an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, about the current autoplaylist.
cmd-pl-repair-help: Repairs an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, repairs the current autoplaylist.
cmd-plrepair-help: Repairs an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, repairs the current autoplaylist.
cmd-lyrics-help:
Displays the lyrics of a song.
If you don't specify any url or keywords, it displays the current song lyrics.
cmd-pladd-help:
Adds a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, adds the current song to the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to add it without url.
cmd-pl-add-help:
Adds a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, adds the current song to the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to add it without url.
cmd-pl-remove-help:
Removes a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, removes the current song from the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to remove it without url.
You can specify the position in the autoplaylist (can be find with plinfo)
cmd-plremove-help:
Removes a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, removes the current song from the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to remove it without url.
You can specify the position in the autoplaylist (can be find with plinfo)
cmd-pl-clear-help:
Deletes an autoplaylist and all his content.
Warning : This operation cannot be undone.
cmd-plclear-help:
Deletes an autoplaylist and all his content.
Warning : This operation cannot be undone.
cmd-plsettings-help:
Displays informations about an autoplaylist or edit his settings.
Whitelisted users can repair, add and remove songs in the autoplaylist.
Everyone can use every autoplaylist, even if they are private.
Everyone can add/remove/repair the autoplaylist if it's not private.
cmd-pl-settings-help:
Displays informations about an autoplaylist or edit his settings.
Whitelisted users can repair, add and remove songs in the autoplaylist.
Everyone can use every autoplaylist, even if they are private.
Everyone can add/remove/repair the autoplaylist if it's not private.
cmd-pl-clone-help: Creates an autoplaylist by copying an existing autoplaylist.
cmd-plclone-help: Creates an autoplaylist by copying an existing autoplaylist.
cmd-promote-help:
Moves a song by specifying its queue index.
If you don't specify an after position, moves it to the first position of the queue.
If you don't specify a song either, it will promotes the last song of queue to the first position of the queue.
cmd-remove-help:
Removes a song from the queue.
If you don't specify any position, removes the last song in queue.
Otherwise remove a song based on his position in queue.
You can specify a second position to remove every song between the two positions.
cmd-playnext-help: Enqueues a song to the first position of the queue.
cmd-setdj-help:
Configures a role as a DJ role (or several).
Member with a DJ role can uses every musical commands.
reset : removes the DJ permissions of every role on the server.
now : displays every roles with the DJ permissions.
everyone : grants my DJ permissions to everyone on the server.
cmd-radio-play-help: Adds a radio to the queue to be played.
cmd-radio-list-help: Displays the list of my available radio stations.
cmd-search-help:
Searches multiple videos at once with the selected parameters.
You can add one of them to the queue. If no service are specified, YouTube is selected by default.

List of the services (platform where the video is searched) :
- YouTube (yt) (by default)
- SoundCloud (sc)
cmd-moveto-help: Moves the song to a specific moment.
cmd-download-help: Erlaubt einen Downloadlink für das derzeitige Lied bereitzustellen.
cmd-autoleave-help: Activity time before disconnecting from voice channel management.
cmd-autoleave-now-help: Displays my current time before leaving the voice channel for inactivity.
cmd-autoleave-set-help: Edits my time before leaving the voice channel for inactivity.
cmd-autoleave-reset-help: Resets my time before leaving the voice channel for inactivity.
cmd-autoleave-never-help: Disables my auto-disconnect function for inactivity.
cmd-npmsg-now-help: Displays my current setting about auto now playing messages at the beginning of new song.
cmd-npmsg-set-help: Choose a default channel for auto now playing messages.
cmd-npmsg-reset-help: Resets my setting about auto now playing messages at the beginning of new song.
cmd-npmsg-never-help: Disable now playing messages at the beginning of new song.
cmd-divorce-help: Divorces you from whoever you were married to.
cmd-blacklist-r-removed: This role has been removed from the guild blacklist.
cmd-blacklist-removed: User has been removed from the guild blacklist.
cmd-blacklist-no-bl-og: There is no user blacklisted on this server.
cmd-clean-cleaned-messages: messages were removed in this channel.
cmd-clean-cleaned-message: message was removed in this channel.
cmd-prefix-set-prefix:
Prefix set for this server.
To go back to the normal prefix, do `{}`.
cmd-ignore-commands-disabled: My commands are now disabled on this channel.
cmd-ignore-commands-enabled: My commands are now enabled on this channel.
cmd-dc-cmd-not-found: I don't have a command called like that.
cmd-dc-add-cmd-now-disabled: Command `{}` now disabled on this server.
cmd-dc-add-already-disabled: This command already disabled!. Use `{}` to enable it anew.
cmd-dc-delete-no-disabled-commands: There are no disabled commands on this server. Use `{}` to start disabling some.
cmd-dc-list-no-dc-list: No disabled commands on this server.
cmd-language-invalid-language: I don't know this language! You can display the list of my available languages with {}
cmd-kick-cant-kick: Ich kann {} weder kicken noch bannen...
cmd-kick-cant-kick-myself: Netter Versuch, aber ich kann mich selber weder kicken noch bannen.
cmd-kick-confirmation-kick: Möchtest du wirklich **{}** kicken oder bannen? ? Gib `yes` oder `no` ein.
cmd-ban-confirmation-ban: Möchtest du wirklich **{}** bannen? Gib `yes` oder `no` ein.
cmd-hackban-confirmation-ban: Möchtest du wirklich **{}** hackbannen? Gebe `yes` oder `no` ein.

I didn't find any welcome message on this channel.
You can set a welcome message by doing {}

cmd-autorole-list-one-role: The autorole on this server is
cmd-autorole-no-autorole: There are no autoroles on this server !
cmd-joinclan-no-clans-available: No clan can be joined, you can allow people to get them with {}
cmd-joinclan-cant-be-gived: This role cannot be gived, you can allow people to get them with {}
cmd-joinclan-already-have-clan: You already have a clan... You cannot join another.
cmd-joinclan-role-not-found: Sorry, I didn't find any role called `{}` on this server.
cmd-clan-no-clans: There are no clans on this server. Use `{}` to start to add some.

cmd-ily-nope: I'm not in love with you...
cmd-ily-yes: Me too :heart:|Seriously ? >///<|It's too much >///< :heart:|I'm in love with you since a long time :heart:|I know, and you know my feelings too :heart:|Thanks! Me too :heart: :heart:

cmd-flip-success: flips a coin and it gives...

cmd-customcommand-already-exists: This command already exists. Use {} to edit it.
cmd-customcommand-raw-content: The content of the custom command {} is :
cmd-customcommand-raw-no-cc: There are no custom commands in this server. Use {} to start adding some.
cmd-customcommand-failed-edit: This command doesn't exist. Use {} to add it.
cmd-poll-init: Say a poll option to add to the poll or say {} to publish the poll.
cmd-poll-cancelled: Poll cancelled, no options have been said.
cmd-meme-one-user: Please mention only one user at once.
cmd-choice-no-choices: You have to specify more than one option, separated by `|`.
cmd-choice-too-much-cmds: Too much commands at the same time.
cmd-nextep-not-found: I didn't find any results for this anime.
cmd-nextep-not-airing: This anime is not airing anymore!
cmd-slap-yourself: du wurdest von dir selbst geschlagen?!
cmd-punch-yourself: du hast dich selbst hart geschlagen?!
cmd-shoot-yourself: I'll not let you do this!
cmd-help-help-not-found: Ich habe für diesen Befehl keine Hilfe gefunden.
cmd-help-description: Du kannst deine eigenen Befehls-Aliase erstellen.
cmd-help-more-info-cmd: Für mehr Informationen über die Benutzung des Befehles, benutze
cmd-help-more-info-cat: Für mehr Informationen über die Kategorie, benutze
cmd-help-support: Wenn du irgendwelche Fragen hast, frage sie auf {}
cmd-shard: This server is on the shard {} !
cmd-info:
**About:** ```I'm Hazuki Watora, a bot created by Zenrac#0001 in 2016 with python 3.5.
In 2018 I got fully rewritten from 0 with the rewrite of discord.py on Python 3.6.
I'm mostly a musical bot, but not only! I was totally coded with discord.py. (Thanks to Danny)``````The character Hazuki Watora was drawn/created by Peko. I don't own any of Watora pictures. https://www.zerochan.net/Peko / http://lumino.sakura.ne.jp``````You can get my command list with =help
You can get more informations about permissions with =permsinfo
You can display my special thanks with =credits``````fix
By using me, you accept the fact that I can conserve the history of the used commands.```
cmd-credits-title: List of the people who made this bot possible.
cmd-perms-info:
**Help with permissions:**
```My permissions are mostly based on your server/channel permissions.

Examples :
- You cannot use the ban command if you cannot ban users.
- You cannot use the purge command if you cannot manage messages.

I'll grant you more functionalities if you're alone in a voice channel with me, or if you have DJ permissions.``````fix
DJ permissions :``````They allow to use every musical commands without necessarily having high permissions on the server.

To grant the DJ permissions to someone, you have to give him a DJ role.``````fix
DJ Roles :``````This is a role that allows to use all musical commands by having it, it grants the same permissions in the case of someone alone in a voice channel with me.

You can set a role as a DJ role with the {}setdj command.
A role called DJ is giving DJ permissions by default.```
cmd-suggestion-useless: Versuche bitte, keine unnötigen Vorschläge zu machen.
cmd-bug-useless: Stelle bitte sicher, dass es wirklich ein Bug ist, bevor du ihn meldest.
cmd-feedback-useless: Achte bitte darauf, dass dein Feedback konstruktiv ist.

cmd-setrole-reset: From now, there are no roles which can be obtained with the {} command anymore!
cmd-setrole-already: This role can already be obtained.

cmd-getrole-not-enough-perm-add: I don't have enough permissions to give the {} role.

Sorry but you are already married!

cmd-marry-declined: Sorry {}, your proposal has been declined...

music-spotify-not-supported: That is not a supported Spotify URI or URL.
music-spotify-maybe-prob: You either provided an invalid URI, or there was a problem.
music-spotify-disabled: Sorry... My Spotify Integration is disabled for the moment. Try again later!
music-spotify-all-failed: Sorry... Everything failed, I didn't add anything!
music-autoplaylist-noten-perms: This autoplaylist is private. You don't have the permission to edit it.
music-autoplaylist-only-owner: Only the autoplaylist owner can edit the autoplaylist settings.
music-plsettings-got-deleted: The current autoplaylist has been deleted. You can't edit or display information about it.
music-join-playing-a-song: I'm already playing a song in a voice channel. You don't have enough permission to make me join yours.
music-join-no-channel: No channel to join. Please join one.
music-join-failed: Unable to connect to the voice channel at this time. Please try again.
music-join-moved-fail: Unable to move this channel. Perhaps missing permissions?
music-play-adding-pl-cancelled: Adding playlist cancelled... I'm not in the voice channel anymore.
music-play-added-pl: {} songs succefully added in the queue (in {}s, about {}s per song).
music-play-not-added-pl: Entschuldigung, aber es wurde kein Lied zur Playlist hinzugefügt.
music-bind-disabling: I'm not bound to any channel on this server anymore.
music-bind-enabling: I'm now bound to this channel on this server. Commands are now restricted to this channel only.
music-stop-song-running: Es wird gerade noch ein Lied abgespielt, weshalb ich den Sprach-Kanal nicht verlassen kann!
music-stop-vote: Your vote to make me disconnect myself has been added!
music-stop-already: You have already voted to make me disconnect myself...
music-stop-succes: Ich verlasse den Sprach-Kanal und lösche die Playlist...
music-skip-added: Stimme, um dieses Lied zu überspringen, hinzugefügt.
music-skip-already: Du hast bereits dafür abgestimmt, dieses Lied zu überspringen.
music-forceskip-succes: {} hat die Überspringung dieses Liedes erzwungen.
music-volume-unreasonable-volume-relativ: Unreasonable volume change provided: {}{:+} -> {}%. Provide a change between `{}%` and `{:+}%`.
music-volume-unreasonable-volume: Unreasonable volume provided: {}%. Provide a value between `0%` and `100%`.
music-volume-unreasonable-volume-patreon: Unreasonable volume provided: {}%. Provide a value between `0%` and `150%`.
music-plnow-no-pl: Die Autoplaylist ist deaktiviert! Benutze {}, um die Autoplaylist zu laden!
music-plnow-now-user-auto:

music-plnow-now-user: Die derzeitige Autoplaylist ist {}'s Persönliche Autoplaylist.
music-plstart-loaded-user: Die persönliche Autoplaylist von {} wurde geladen!
music-plstart-dont-have: Entschuldigung, aber dieser Benutzer besitzt keine persönliche Autoplaylist.
music-plstart-doesnt-exists: Eine Autoplaylist mit dem Namen {} existiert nicht! Bitte bitte vergewissere dich, dass deine Nachricht korrekt ist oder benutze {} wenn du eine Autoplaylist erstellen willst.
music-plnew-try-to-hack: Du kannst so keine persönliche Autoplaylist erstellen, vor allem nicht, wenn es sich nicht um deine ID handelt.
music-plnew-already-exists: Entschuldigung, aber die Autoplaylist {} existiert bereits!
music-plinfo-not-found: Entschuldigung, aber ich konnte diese Autoplaylist nicht finden!
music-pl-disabled: Die Autoplaylist ist zurzeit deaktiviert! Benutze {} um eine Autoplaylist zu laden.
music-plinfo-loading: Ich berechne die Autoplaylist, gedulte dich bitte einen Moment...
music-plinfo-empty-auto: Es gibt kein Lied in dieser Autoplaylist, benutze {} um welche hinzuzufügen!
music-plinfo-not-accessible: IST NICHT ERREICHBAR, ENTFERNE ES MIT {}
music-plinfo-perso-display: Die {} persönliche Autoplaylist besteht aus {} Liedern!

music-plinfo-warning: Warnung : Es gibt einen toten Link in deiner Autoplaylist. Du kannst diesen einfach mit {} entfernen

music-plrepair-someone: Du kannst nur deine eigene Autoplaylist bearbeiten.
music-plrepair-loading: Ich repariere diese Autoplaylist, bitte gedulte dich einen Moment...
music-plrepair-all-ok: Alles ist okay, diese Autoplaylist muss nicht reperiert werden!

music-lyrics-title-not-find: Ich kann den Titel nicht finden, bitte vergewissere dich, dass die URL korrekt ist.
music-lyrics-no-current-song: Es wird derzet kein Lied abgespielt. Gib bitte eine URL an.
music-lyrics-not-found: Entschuldigung, aber ich konnte die Lyrics zu diesen Lied nicht finden.
music-pladd-already-present: Dieses Lied ist bereits in der Autoplaylist!

music-pladd-pls-added: Ich habe {} Lieder zu den schon bestehenden {} hinzugefügt.
music-pladd-all-already: Every song were already in the autoplaylist, I didn't add anything.
music-pladd-already-present: Song already present in the autoplaylist!
music-plremove-not-found: Ich konnte dieses Lied in der derzeitigen Autoplaylist nicht finden.
music-plremove-removed: Dieses Lied wirde von der Autoplaylist entfernt.
music-plremove-pls-removed: I've removed {} songs, but {} were not in the autoplaylist.
music-plremove-all-already: Every song were not in the autoplaylist, I didn't remove anything.
music-plclear-confirmation: Möchtest Du **{}** wirklich löschen? Gib `yes` oder `no` ein.
music-plclear-cancelled: Cancelling the deletion of the autoplaylist.
music-plclone-confirmation: **{}** is going to be cloned. Please type the new autoplaylist name :
music-plclone-cloned: **{}** has been cloned with success as **{}**.
music-repeat-disabled: I'll not repeat the queue anymore.
music-repeat-empty: I can't repeat an empty queue.
music-clear-empty: I can't clear an empty queue.
music-clear-vote: Your vote to clear the queue has been added.
music-clear-already: You have already voted to clear the queue.
music-promote-empty: I can't promote something in an empty queue.
music-promote-error: You have to specify a song position between 1 and {}.
music-promote-promoted: Promoted {} to the first position of the queue.
music-promote-promoted-to: Promoted {} to the position {} of the queue.
music-promote-playlist: You cannot use this command with a playlist...
music-shuffle-empty: I can't shuffle an empty queue.
music-remove-empty: I can't remove something in an empty queue.
music-stream-added: I've added this stream to the queue.

music-setdj-is-now: The server DJ role is now : {}
music-radio-invalid-syntax: Dieses Radio ist mir unbekannt. Überprüfe deine Rechtsschreibung oder benutze {}, um dir eine Liste aller Verfügbaren Radiostationen anzeigen zu lassen. Otherwrise you can find a fallback URL and play it with the play command.

music-search-didnt-find: Entschuldigung, ich konnte keine Videos finden...
music-supersearch-select: Type the number of the song you want to play.

music-defvolume-set: Das Standartvolumen auf dem Server beträgt nun {}

music-autoleave-now: My current time before leaving the voice channel for inactivity is {}.
music-autoleave-now-never: My auto-disconnect function for inactivity has been disabled, I'll not disconnect myself for inactivity.

music-autoleave-unreasonable-patron: You cannot set a time bigger than {}, use {} if you want me to never disconnect myself for inactivity.
